long_description: For some active fun on your next picnic, road trip or camping trip, bring the family-friendly Racket Set from Outside Inside. It's ideal for 2 or more players ages 5 and up. Set includes 2 rackets, 1 foam tennis ball, 1 skip ball and 1 birdie so you can choose your own game to play. Comes in a polyester-and-mesh carry bag; game instructions included.
short_description: For some active fun on your next picnic, road trip or camping trip, bring the family-friendly Racket Set from Outside Inside. It's ideal for 2 or more players ages 5 and up.
